item.title: Architecture
item.description: Architecture This chapter gives some insights into the inner workings of Fore. An understanding of the principles certainly helps to get the most out of Fore. Fore is build as a classical MVC architecture. Model -> <fx-model> Element View -> Fore UI Elements Controller -> Fore Action Elements The ForeBody At the very minimum there needs to be a fx-fore element to get Fore into live. Without content this won’t do anything so we can consider these a unit and call it a ‘ForeBody’.
